00061 //
00062 // Delta Diversity Metric (Deb et al. 2002, IEEE TEC 6(2) ) 
00063 //
00064 
00065 bool cmpDelta(IndividualMOO *a, IndividualMOO *b) 
00066 {
00067         if(a->getMOOFitness(0) < b->getMOOFitness(0)) return true;
00068         return false;
00069 }
00070 
00071 double delta(ArchiveMOO &q, Array< double > &pf) 
00072 {
00073   if((q.readArchive(0)).getNoOfObj( )!=2)
00074     cerr << "Warning: delta(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00075 
00076         double Delta = 0.;
00077         double dBar = 0.;
00078         unsigned i ;
00079 
00080         if(q.size()<2) return 1.;
00081 
00082         vector<IndividualMOO *> v;
00083         vector<double> ds;
00084         unsigned n = q.size();
00085 
00086         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) v.push_back(&q.readArchive(i));
00087         sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmpDelta);
00088         for(i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) 
00089         {
00090                 double f1 = v[i]->getMOOFitness(0);
00091                 double f2 = v[i]->getMOOFitness(1);
00092                 double g1 = v[i+1]->getMOOFitness(0);
00093                 double g2 = v[i+1]->getMOOFitness(1);
00094                 double d = sqrt(sqr(f1 - g1) + sqr(f2 - g2));
00095                 ds.push_back( d );
00096                 dBar += d;
00097         }
00098 
00099         dBar /= (n - 1.);
00100 
00101         double numerator = 0;
00102         double ex = 0.;
00103         for(i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) numerator += fabs(ds[i] - dBar);
00104 
00105         unsigned last = pf.dim(0) - 1;
00106 
00107         double e1 = sqrt(sqr(pf(0, 0) - v[0]->getMOOFitness(0)) +
00108                 sqr(pf(0, 1) - v[0]->getMOOFitness(1)));
00109         double e2 = sqrt(sqr(pf(0, 0) - v[n-1]->getMOOFitness(0)) +
00110                 sqr(pf(0, 1) - v[n-1]->getMOOFitness(1)));
00111         double e3 = sqrt(sqr(pf(last, 0) - v[0]->getMOOFitness(0)) +
00112                 sqr(pf(last, 1) - v[0]->getMOOFitness(1)));
00113         double e4 = sqrt(sqr(pf(last, 0) - v[n-1]->getMOOFitness(0)) +
00114                 sqr(pf(last, 1) - v[n-1]->getMOOFitness(1)));
00115 
00116         if((e1 + e4) < (e2 + e3)) ex = (e1 + e4);
00117         else ex = (e2 + e3);
00118 
00119         Delta = (numerator + ex) / (ex + (n - 1) * dBar);
00120 
00121         return Delta;
00122 }

00124 //
00125 // Upsilon Convergence Metric (Deb et al. 2002, IEEE TEC 6(2) ) 
00126 //
00127 
00128 
00129 double upsilonDistanceElement(IndividualMOO &i, Array< double > &pf) 
00130 {
00131         double x1 = i.getMOOFitness( 0 );
00132         double x2 = i.getMOOFitness( 1 );
00133         unsigned j;
00134         double d, e;
00135         d = sqrt( sqr(x1 - pf(0, 0)) + sqr(x2 - pf(0, 1)));
00136 
00137         for(j = 1; j < pf.dim(0); j++) 
00138         {
00139                 e = sqrt( sqr(x1 - pf(j, 0)) + sqr(x2 - pf(j, 1)));
00140                 if(e < d) d = e;
00141         }
00142         return d;
00143 }    
00144 
00145 double upsilonDistanceFront(ArchiveMOO &q, Array< double > &pf, double &stdv) 
00146 {
00147 
00148   if((q.readArchive(0)).getNoOfObj( )!=2)
00149     cerr << "Warning: upsilonDistanceFront(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00150 
00151         unsigned nq = q.size();
00152         double square = 0.;
00153         double mean = 0;
00154         for(unsigned i = 0; i < nq; i++) 
00155         {
00156                 double d = upsilonDistanceElement(q.readArchive(i), pf);
00157                 mean += d;
00158                 square += d*d;
00159         }
00160         mean = mean / (double)(nq);
00161         if(nq>1)
00162                 stdv = ( square - (double)nq * mean * mean) / ( (double)nq - 1. );
00163         else
00164                 stdv = 0;
00165         stdv = sqrt(stdv);
00166         return mean;
00167 }

00171 //
00172 // Bosman's Convergence/Diversity Metric (Bosman et al. 2003, IEEE TEC 7(2) ) 
00173 //
00174 
00175 double bosmanDistanceElement(Array< double > &fitness, Array< double > &pf) 
00176 {
00177         unsigned j;
00178         double d, e;
00179 
00180         d = sqrt( sqr(fitness(0,0) - pf(0)) + sqr(fitness(0,1) - pf(1)) );
00181 
00182         for(j = 1; j < fitness.dim(0); j++) 
00183         {
00184                 e = sqrt( sqr(fitness(j,0) - pf(0)) + sqr(fitness(j,1) - pf(1)));
00185                 if(e < d) d = e;
00186         }
00187         return d;
00188 }    
00189 
00190 
00191 double bosmanDistanceFront(ArchiveMOO &q, Array< double > &pf, double &stdv) 
00192 {
00193 
00194   if((q.readArchive(0)).getNoOfObj( )!=2)
00195     cerr << "Warning: bosmanDistanceFront(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00196 
00197         unsigned i;     
00198         unsigned samplesize = pf.dim(0);
00199 
00200         Array<double> fitness(q.size(),2);
00201         Array<double> buffer;
00202 
00203         for(i = 0; i < fitness.dim(0); i++)
00204         {
00205                 fitness(i,0)=q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 0 );
00206                 fitness(i,1)=q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 1 );
00207         }
00208 
00209         double square = 0.;
00210         double mean = 0;
00211         for(i = 0; i < samplesize; i++) 
00212         {
00213           buffer = pf.row(i);     
00214                 double d = bosmanDistanceElement(fitness, buffer);
00215                 mean += d;
00216                 square += d*d;
00217         }
00218         mean = mean / (double)(samplesize);
00219         if(samplesize>1)
00220                 stdv = ( square - (double)(samplesize) * mean * mean) / ( (double)samplesize - 1. );
00221         else
00222                 stdv = 0;
00223         stdv = sqrt(stdv);
00224         return mean;
00225 }

00228 //
00229 // Zitzler's Hypervolume Metric (Zitzler 1999 ) 
00230 //
00231 
00232 void minmax(Array< double > &pf, double &min1,double &max1, double &min2, double &max2,bool init=false)
00233 {
00234         unsigned j;
00235         double MAX;
00236 
00237 #ifdef _WIN32
00238         MAX = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00239 #else
00240         MAX = MAXDOUBLE;
00241 #endif
00242 
00243         if(init)
00244                 min1= MAX , min2= MAX, max1= -MAX, max2= -MAX;
00245 
00246         for(j = 0; j < pf.dim(0); j++) 
00247         {
00248                 if(pf(j,0)<min1) min1 = pf(j,0);
00249                 if(pf(j,0)>max1) max1 = pf(j,0);
00250                 if(pf(j,1)<min2) min2 = pf(j,1);
00251                 if(pf(j,1)>max2) max2 = pf(j,1);
00252         }
00253 }
00254 
00255 void minmax(ArchiveMOO &q, double &min1,double &max1, double &min2, double &max2,bool init=false)
00256 {
00257         if(q.size() <2) return;
00258 
00259         Array<double>   af(q.size(),2);
00260 
00261         for (unsigned i=0;i<af.dim(0);i++)
00262         {
00263                 af(i,0) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 0 );
00264                 af(i,1) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 1 );
00265         }
00266 
00267         minmax(af, min1, max1, min2, max2,init);
00268 }

00270 
00271 double hyperVolumeElement(double x1, double x2, double y, double bound) 
00272 {
00273         return (x2 - x1) * (bound - y);
00274 }    
00275 
00276 double hyperVolumeValue(Array<double> &pf, double min1,double max1, double min2, double max2, bool minimizeall) 
00277 {
00278 
00279   if(pf.ndim( )!=2)
00280     cerr << "Warning: hyperVolumeValue(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00281 
00282   if(!minimizeall)
00283     {
00284       cerr << "Error at runtime:: hyperVolumeValue(...) implemented for minimization of all objectives only ..." << endl;
00285       abort();
00286     }
00287         unsigned i;     
00288         unsigned np = pf.dim(0);
00289 
00290         if(np<2)
00291                 return 0;
00292 
00293         Array<double>   p = pf.col(0);
00294         Array<unsigned> pi(np);
00295 
00296         sort(p,pi); 
00297 
00298         double sum = 0.;
00299 
00300         for(i = 1; i < np; i++)
00301                 sum += hyperVolumeElement(pf(pi(i-1),0),pf(pi(i),0), pf(pi(i-1),1),max2);
00302 
00303         sum += hyperVolumeElement(pf(pi(np-1),0),max1, pf(pi(np-1),1),max2);
00304 
00305         sum = sum / ((max1 - min1) * (max2 - min2));
00306 
00307         return sum; 
00308 }
00309 
00310 double hyperVolumeValue(ArchiveMOO &q, double min1,double max1, double min2, double max2, bool minimizeall) 
00311 {
00312 
00313   if((q.readArchive(0)).getNoOfObj( )!=2)
00314     cerr << "Warning: hyperVolumeValue(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00315 
00316   if(q.size() <2) return 0;
00317 
00318         Array<double>   af(q.size(),2);
00319 
00320         for (unsigned i=0;i<af.dim(0);i++)
00321         {
00322                 af(i,0) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 0 );
00323                 af(i,1) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 1 );
00324         }
00325 
00326         return hyperVolumeValue(af, min1, max1, min2, max2, minimizeall);
00327 }       
00328 
00329 //
00330 // Aggregation Metric 
00331 //
00332 
00333 double aggregationElement(Array< double > &pf, double tradeoff) 
00334 {
00335         unsigned j;
00336         double d, e;
00337 
00338         d = (1 - tradeoff) * pf(0,0) + tradeoff * pf(0,1);
00339 
00340         for(j = 1; j < pf.dim(0); j++) 
00341         {
00342                 e = (1 - tradeoff) * pf(j,0) + tradeoff * pf(j,1);
00343                 if(e < d) d = e;
00344         }
00345 
00346         return d;
00347 }    
00348 
00349 double aggregationValue(Array<double> &pf, unsigned resolution) 
00350 {
00351 
00352   if(pf.ndim( )!=2)
00353     cerr << "Warning: aggregationValue(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00354 
00355         unsigned i;     
00356 
00357         double sum = 0.;
00358 
00359         for(i = 0; i < resolution; i++)
00360                 sum += aggregationElement(pf, ((double)i/((double)resolution-1)));
00361 
00362         sum = sum / ((double)resolution - 1);
00363         return sum;
00364 }
00365 
00366 double aggregationValue(ArchiveMOO &q, unsigned resolution) 
00367 {
00368 
00369   if((q.readArchive(0)).getNoOfObj( )!=2)
00370     cerr << "Warning: aggregationValue(...) implemented for two objectives only ..." << endl;
00371 
00372         Array<double>   af(q.size(),2);
00373 
00374         for (unsigned i=0;i<af.dim(0);i++)
00375         {
00376                 af(i,0) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 0 );
00377                 af(i,1) = q.readArchive(i).getMOOFitness( 1 );
00378         }
00379 
00380         return aggregationValue(af, resolution);
00381 }
